value: {"aid": "http://arxiv.org/abs/2505.00469v1", "title": "Enumerations of 1-rotational Steiner systems", "summary": "In this paper new $1$-rotational 2-Steiner systems for different admissible\n$v,k$ pairs are introduced. In particular, $1$-rotational unitals of order $4$\nare enumerated.", "main_category": "math.CO", "categories": "math.CO", "published": "2025-05-01T11:45:18Z"}
